languages.text: Оставаться на мостике нельзя. На офицерской палубе развернут аварийный штаб, где Вольный Торговец сможет возглавить спасательную операцию.
It is too risky to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck, from which the Rogue Trader can then lead the rescue operation.
languages.original_text: Оставаться на мостике нельзя. На офицерской палубе развернут аварийный штаб, где Вольный Торговец сможет возглавить спасательную операцию.

traits.locale_text: It is not safe to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck where the Rogue Trader can lead the rescue operation.
It is not safe to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck where the Rogue Trader can lead the rescue operation.
It is not safe to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck, from which the Rogue Trader can then lead the rescue operation.
It is not safe to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck, from which the Rogue Trader can then lead the rescue operation.
It is too risky to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck, from which the Rogue Trader can then lead the rescue operation.
It is too risky to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck, from which the Rogue Trader can then lead the rescue operation.

languages.text: Es demasiado peligroso seguir en el puente. Se establecerá un cuartel general de emergencia en la cubierta de oficiales para que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente dirija el rescate desde allí.
languages.original_text: It is too risky to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck, from which the Rogue Trader can then lead the rescue operation.

traits.locale_text: Es demasiado peligroso seguir en el puente. Se establecerá un cuartel general de emergencia en la cubierta de oficiales para que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente dirija el rescate desde allí.

languages.text: このままブリッジにいるのは危険すぎる。士官デッキに緊急本部を設置して、そこから自由開拓者が救出作戦を指揮するのだ。
languages.original_text: It is too risky to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck, from which the Rogue Trader can then lead the rescue operation.

traits.locale_text: このままブリッジにいるのは危険すぎる。士官デッキに緊急本部を設置して、そこから自由開拓者が救出作戦を指揮するのだ。

languages.text: 留在舰桥上实在是过于危险。船上的军官在军官甲板上设立了紧急指挥中心，行商浪人可以在那里领导救援行动。
languages.original_text: It is too risky to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck, from which the Rogue Trader can then lead the rescue operation.

traits.locale_text: 留在舰桥上实在是过于危险。船上的军官在军官甲板上设立了紧急指挥中心，行商浪人可以在那里领导救援行动。

languages.text: Es ist zu riskant, auf der Brücke zu bleiben. Ein Notfallhauptquartier wird auf dem Offiziersdeck eingerichtet. Von dort aus kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dann die Rettungsmission leiten.
languages.original_text: It is too risky to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck, from which the Rogue Trader can then lead the rescue operation.

traits.locale_text: Es ist zu riskant, auf der Brücke zu bleiben. Ein Notfallhauptquartier wird auf dem Offiziersdeck eingerichtet. Von dort aus kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dann die Rettungsmission leiten.

languages.text: Puisque rester sur la passerelle est trop risqué, un quartier général d'urgence va être installé sur le pont des officiers, d'où {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pourra mener les opérations de sauvetage.
languages.original_text: It is too risky to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck, from which the Rogue Trader can then lead the rescue operation.

traits.locale_text: Puisque rester sur la passerelle est trop risqué, un quartier général d'urgence va être installé sur le pont des officiers, d'où {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pourra mener les opérations de sauvetage.

languages.text: Köprüde kalmak çok riskli. Subay güvertesine bir acil durum karargâhı kurulacak ve Hür Tacir kurtarma faaliyetlerini buradan yönetebilecek.
languages.original_text: It is too risky to stay on the bridge. An emergency headquarters will be set up on the officers' deck, from which the Rogue Trader can then lead the rescue operation.
